message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you'll get 20%. What do you say?
I'll give you 40% now, and I'll take 60%. It's a decent compromise, don't you think?
I'm not willing to give up 60% like you proposed. I'll take 70% now, and you can have 30%. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. I'll take 45% and you can have 55%. It's still a decent compromise, don't you think?
I'm not going to give up 55% like you proposed. I'll take 60% now, and you can have 40%. It's time to make a deal, Bob!
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.
